flawed_nl_solution:
Tory sold 12 packs + 7 packs = <<12+7=14>>14 packs to his family members.
Tory sold 14 packs + 5 packs = <<14+5=19>>19 packs in total
He has to sell 50 packs - 19 packs = <<50-19=31>>31 more packs of cookies to reach his target
#### 31

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 19, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
